grid.css: background-image: linear-gradient(#474bff 2px, transparent 2px), linear-gradient(to right, #474bff 2px, transparent 2px); background-size: 32px 32px; background-color: #47d3ff;

crossDots.css: background-image: radial-gradient(#474bff 2px, transparent 2px), radial-gradient(#474bff 2px, transparent 2px); background-size: 32px 32px; background-position: 0 0, 16px 16px; background-color: #47d3ff;

verticalLines.css: background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(to right, #474bff, #474bff 2px, transparent 2px, transparent); background-size: 32px 32px; background-color: #47d3ff;

horizontalLines.css: background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(#474bff, #474bff 2px, transparent 2px, transparent); background-size: 32px 32px; background-color: #47d3ff;

diagonalLines.css: background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, #474bff 0, #474bff 2px, transparent 0, transparent 50%); background-size: 32px 32px; background-color: #47d3ff;

crosses.css: background: radial-gradient(circle, transparent 20%, #47d3ff 20%, #47d3ff 80%, transparent 80%, transparent) 0% 0% / 64px 64px, radial-gradient(circle, transparent 20%, #47d3ff 20%, #47d3ff 80%, transparent 80%, transparent) 32px 32px / 64px 64px, linear-gradient(#474bff 2px, transparent 2px) 0px -1px / 32px 32px, linear-gradient(90deg, #474bff 2px, #47d3ff 2px) -1px 0px / 32px 32px #47d3ff; background-size: 64px 64px, 64px 64px, 32px 32px, 32px 32px; background-color: #47d3ff;

plusSign.css: background: conic-gradient(at 10% 50%,#0000 75%,#474bff 0), conic-gradient(at 10% 50%,#0000 75%,#474bff 0) calc(1*32px) calc(3*32px), conic-gradient(at 10% 50%,#0000 75%,#474bff 0) calc(2*32px) calc(1*32px), conic-gradient(at 10% 50%,#0000 75%,#474bff 0) calc(3*32px) calc(4*32px), conic-gradient(at 10% 50%,#0000 75%,#474bff 0) calc(4*32px) calc(2*32px), conic-gradient(at 50% 10%,#0000 75%,#474bff 0) 0 calc(4*32px), conic-gradient(at 50% 10%,#0000 75%,#474bff 0) calc(1*32px) calc(2*32px), conic-gradient(at 50% 10%,#0000 75%,#474bff 0) calc(2*32px) 0, conic-gradient(at 50% 10%,#0000 75%,#474bff 0) calc(3*32px) calc(3*32px), conic-gradient(at 50% 10%,#0000 75%,#474bff 0) calc(4*32px) calc(1*32px), #47d3ff; background-size: 160px 160px;

design2.css: background: linear-gradient(45deg, #474bff 20%, transparent 20%, transparent 80%, #474bff 80%, #474bff 100%) 0% 0% / 3em 3em, linear-gradient(135deg, #474bff 20%, transparent 20%, transparent 80%, #474bff 80%, #474bff 100%) 0% 0% / 3em 3em, radial-gradient(circle at top, transparent 9%, #474bff 10%, #474bff 15%, transparent 16%) 0% 0% / 3em 3em, radial-gradient(circle at bottom, transparent 9%, #474bff 10%, #474bff 15%, transparent 16%) 0% 0% / 3em 3em, radial-gradient(circle at right, transparent 9%, #474bff 10%, #474bff 15%, transparent 16%) 0% 0% / 3em 3em, radial-gradient(circle at left, transparent 9%, #474bff 10%, #474bff 15%, transparent 16%) 0% 0% / 3em 3em, radial-gradient(#474bff 25%, transparent 26%) 0% 0% / 3em 3em #47d3ff; background-size: 31px 31px;

hexagons.css: background: linear-gradient(60deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25.5%, transparent 75%, #474bff 75%, #474bff), linear-gradient(-60deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25.5%, transparent 75%, #474bff 75%, #474bff); background-size: 64px 111px; background-color: #47d3ff;

zigzag.css: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%) -32px 0, linear-gradient(225deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%) -32px 0, linear-gradient(315deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(45deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%); background-size: 64px 64px; background-color: #47d3ff;

waves.css: background: radial-gradient(circle at 100% 50%, transparent 20%, #47d3ff 21%, #47d3ff 34%, transparent 35%, transparent), radial-gradient(circle at 0% 50%, transparent 20%, #47d3ff 21%, #47d3ff 34%, transparent 35%, transparent) 0 -50px; background-color: #474bff; background-size: 75px 100px;

cubes.css: background: linear-gradient(30deg, #474bff 12%, transparent 12.5%, transparent 87%, #474bff 87.5%, #474bff), linear-gradient(150deg, #474bff 12%, transparent 12.5%, transparent 87%, #474bff 87.5%, #474bff), linear-gradient(30deg, #474bff 12%, transparent 12.5%, transparent 87%, #474bff 87.5%, #474bff), linear-gradient(150deg, #474bff 12%, transparent 12.5%, transparent 87%, #474bff 87.5%, #474bff), linear-gradient(60deg, #474bff77 25%, transparent 25.5%, transparent 75%, #474bff77 75%, #474bff77), linear-gradient(60deg, #474bff77 25%, transparent 25.5%, transparent 75%, #474bff77 75%, #474bff77); background-size: 80px 140px; background-position: 0 0, 0 0, 40px 70px, 40px 70px, 0 0, 40px 70px; background-color: #47d3ff;

chevron.css: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%) -32px 0, linear-gradient(225deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%) -32px 0, linear-gradient(315deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(45deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%); background-size: 64px 64px; background-color: #47d3ff;

circles.css: background-image: radial-gradient(#474bff 20%, transparent 20%), radial-gradient(#474bff 20%, transparent 20%); background-color: #47d3ff; background-position: 0 0, 32px 32px; background-size: 64px 64px;

stars.css: background-image: radial-gradient(#474bff 2px, transparent 2px), radial-gradient(#474bff 2px, transparent 2px); background-size: 64px 64px; background-position: 0 0, 32px 32px; background-color: #47d3ff;

weave.css: background: linear-gradient(45deg, #474bff 12%, transparent 0, transparent 88%, #474bff 0), linear-gradient(135deg, transparent 37%, #47d3ff 0, #47d3ff 63%, transparent 0), linear-gradient(45deg, transparent 37%, #474bff 0, #474bff 63%, transparent 0) #47d3ff; background-size: 64px 64px;

triangles.css: background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(60deg, #474bff, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 75%, #474bff 75%, #474bff 100%); background-size: 32px 56px; background-color: #47d3ff;

polkaDots.css: background-image: radial-gradient(#474bff 2px, transparent 2px), radial-gradient(#474bff 2px, transparent 2px); background-size: 32px 32px; background-position: 0 0, 16px 16px; background-color: #47d3ff;

honeycomb.css: background: radial-gradient(circle farthest-side at 0% 50%, #47d3ff 23.5%, #0000 0) 21px 30px, radial-gradient(circle farthest-side at 0% 50%, #474bff 24%, #0000 0) 19px 30px, linear-gradient(#47d3ff 14%, #0000 0, #0000 85%, #47d3ff 0) 0 0, linear-gradient(150deg, #47d3ff 24%, #474bff 0, #474bff 26%, #0000 0, #0000 74%, #474bff 0, #474bff 76%, #47d3ff 0) 0 0, linear-gradient(30deg, #47d3ff 24%, #474bff 0, #474bff 26%, #0000 0, #0000 74%, #474bff 0, #474bff 76%, #47d3ff 0) 0 0, linear-gradient(90deg, #474bff 2%, #47d3ff 0, #47d3ff 98%, #474bff 0%) 0 0 #47d3ff; background-size: 40px 60px;

chevrons.css: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%) -32px 0, linear-gradient(225deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%) -32px 0, linear-gradient(315deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(45deg, #474bff 25%, transparent 25%); background-size: 64px 64px; background-color: #47d3ff;

maze.css: background: linear-gradient(#474bff 2px, transparent 2px) 0 -1px, linear-gradient(90deg, #474bff 2px, transparent 2px) -1px 0, linear-gradient(#47d3ff 1px, transparent 1px) 0 -1px, linear-gradient(90deg, #47d3ff 1px, #47d3ff 1px) -1px 0; background-size: 32px 32px, 32px 32px, 8px 8px, 8px 8px;
